content.question:
The distribution of the length of employment for workers at a factory is moderately skewed to the right, with mean <math alttext="7.4" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>7.4</mn> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> years and standard deviation <math alttext="5.6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> years. The factory manager will select a random sample of <math alttext="100" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>100</mn> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> employees to survey.

Which of the following best describes the sampling distribution of the sample means of length of employment for samples of size <math alttext="100" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>100</mn> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>?

choices.label: Moderately skewed to the right, with mean <math alttext="7.4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>7.4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> years and standard deviation <math alttext="5.6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> years

Moderately skewed to the right, with mean <math alttext="7.4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>7.4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> years and standard deviation less than <math alttext="5.6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> years

Moderately skewed to the right, with mean less than <math alttext="7.4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>7.4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> years and standard deviation less than <math alttext="5.6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> years

Approximately normal, with mean less than <math alttext="7.4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>7.4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> years and standard deviation <math alttext="5.6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> years

Approximately normal, with mean <math alttext="7.4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>7.4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> years and standard deviation less than <math alttext="5.6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> years

content.answer: Approximately normal, with mean <math alttext="7.4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>7.4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> years and standard deviation less than <math alttext="5.6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> years
